item.title: Tutorial 1
item.description: In this tutorial, we are going to go over the tutorial sheet, which contains 2 questions. The question can be found here. The answer can be found here. For some extra stuff I went over during this tutorial, they can be found here.

item.title: Tutorial 2
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll go over the quiz (Version B) that the students wrote last week. Q1 a) ANS: B Reason: rnorm(n, mean, sd) round(#, digits) b) ANS: D Reason: A,B – cannot tell as it’s a categorical variable C – cannot tell as we can rearrange the order D – True c) ANS: C Reason: (I) – False (eyeball) (II) – Recall the relationship between boxplot and histrogram/density plot
